 In order to choose the neutral faction and to enlighten the choices, 
I would invite the other instigators of the other factions to present 
them. These are the Monks, the Chivtrons, the Alliance or any other 
that can be thought of!
 This is some kind of promotionnal post for the Tripredacus as well as 
a clarification on their situation.
 The Tripredacus are a faction whose ambitions are to conquer 
Cybertron and reign over it with an iron grip. For this, they 
infiltrated Predacon ranks and keep the discontent between Maximals 
and Predacons warm enough to act on their own agenda. However, the 
Actions of Megatron are jeopardizing their situation of power, in the 
Tripredacus Council, for example. They need to get him, dead if 
possible...
 They still use Techno-organic bodies, but not in the same way as 
before the restart. Those who are T-O have been made so from spark 
manipulations, their bodies simulating organic matter from top 
technology elements. Many, on the opposite, have preferred to keep a 
traditionnal BW-like body.
